House Bill/Resolution NO. HB02279
FULL TITLE : AN ACT CREATING THE SPRATLY ISLANDS DEVELOPMENT AUTHORITY

ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2017-02-17

          -1st TWG meeting, members agree to go to area for a visit
      3. Deliberated by the TWG on 2017-03-17
          -2nd TWG in Palawan
      4. Measure approved by the Committee on 2017-05-16
